include_directories(${PROJECT_INCLUDE_PRIVATE})

add_subdirectory(cellmgr)
add_subdirectory(common)
add_subdirectory(config)
add_subdirectory(pugixml)
add_subdirectory(gamespace)
add_subdirectory(realghost)
add_subdirectory(aoi)
if(NOT WIN32)
add_subdirectory(cellmgr_resume)
add_subdirectory(shm)
add_subdirectory(gamespace_resume)
endif()
